This forum has been created to help you find an opponent to debate formally. Simply advertise your willingness to debate an issue. If you find a willing opponent, notify me by PM and I, as a moderator, will be happy to help both of you hammer out the parameters of the proposed debate (actual resolution wording, number of posts, etc.). I maintain a current list of your peers who frequent this forum who have expressed a willingness to judge a formal debate also. If agreement is reached on all issues, then I'll set up your thread in the Debate Room below and let the fireworks begin.
 
 Go ahead, give it a try! It is a wonderful way to put your convictions to the ultimate test.
 
 Also, if you're interested in being a judge, PM me.

i would like to debate how somebody thinks the world will end. for example my belief is that when the drinkable water runs out we will all die. the solution is to go into space and find more, but that is still way far away from current human resources, so that's my theory. i would place that at about 100,000 years away so maybe something else will get there first. any takers? its a grim subject but i am just curious.

The Water Cycle
 
 Just so you know, we're unlikely to run out of drinking water any time soon.
 
 Personally, I'd say the planet will last until the sun runs out of fuel, we get hit by something colossal or humanity accidentally blows it up out of arrogance.
